deviations.reason: Multiple identifiers are ambiguous due to legacy code integration, third-party library requirements, or project-specific naming conventions. Refactoring these identifiers is not feasible at this stage without risking project stability or compatibility.
For sections of code that interact with libraries or components not maintained by the project, this guideline is not applied to avoid compatibility and maintenance issues.
Function-like macros are used in auto-generated code to maintain compatibility with libraries and hardware interfaces.
Required for compatibility with the generated files to maintain compatibility with libraries and hardware interfaces.
All enum values are non-negative and fit in uint8_t. These assignments and case labels are permitted by MISRA C:2023 Rule 10.3 Exception 1 and Exception 3.
